job.title: Software Engineer, Quality (SDET) Senior/Lead/Principal
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongProducts and Technologystrong Job Details brbrstrongAs a member of the Salesforce Integration Cloud MuleSoft Team you will use Agile methodologies to plan coordinate and lead software projects that result in delightful experiences for customersbrbrYou are a deep thinker with a natural curiosity to learn our customers business and a dedicated advocate for great customer experience and worldclass quality at scale in a complex modern microservices environment You will also have a strong analytical mindset and will drive actions at the right level to ensure that we can maximize engineering productivity while delivering a stable secure and performant experience to our customers Finally you will be responsible for clear and courageous communication at all levels about the delivery risk and quality outlook of our productsbrbrustrong Requirements Senior brstronguulli5 years of software development with some exposure to quality automation engineeringliliExperience building automation and automation frameworks helping teams to shift leftliliUnderstanding of the test pyramid and how to enable shiftleft execute and monitor tests at each levelliliStrong programming skills in either Java Javascript  experience using Mulesoft or doing Salesforce customization or integration is a plusliliAbility to operate in a microservicebased architecture deployed on Kubernetes and AWSliliHandson experience with quality measurement evaluation and optimizationliliExperience providing technical leadership and coaching to people across scrum teamsliliGood Understanding of backend systems and APIs brliulstronguPreferred SkillsbrustrongulliExperience with some of the following quality tools WebDriverio Selenium RCPTT RestAPIliliExperience delivering SaaS applications at scaleliliExperience with ChaosMonkey testing at both infrastructure and UI layersliliExperience in using UI profilers and deep knowledge of chrome developer and testing toolsliliExperience with APM and logging tools like New Relic and SumoLogicliliUnderstanding of and experience with specialized data platforms like Influx and SparkliliHandson Experience in Javascript React and NodeJS brliulstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliHelp build our automation tech foundation that will allow engineering teams to build execute and monitor various different types of tests across the testing pyramid shiftleftliliDesign and deliver automation as necessary with a quality mindset across the organizationliliConsult with Engineering teams as necessary to address systemic quality gapsliliProvide oversight through code and design reviews for features and tests delivered by other developers within their supported scrum teams Participate in higherlevel reviews as necessaryliliMaintain contact with support teams and customers to understand reallife customer journeys build test casesliliOrganize and drive crossproduct testing prior to major releasesliliMonitor customer experience and advocate for customer enhancementsliliMonitor product andor featurelevel quality health metrics testability test health test coverage etcliliWork closely with senior developers PM and UX to ensure features are delivered to meet business and quality requirementsliliTroubleshoot production issues and develop test strategies to avoid these incidentsliliDo the right thing always for our customersbrliulstronguBenefitsbrbrustrongCompetitive compensationbrbrEmployee Stock Purchase ProgrambrbrOSDE 410 for the family groupbrbrWellness and Education ReimbursementbrbrUnlimited PTObrbrParental LeavebrbrChildcare subsidiesbrbrAnd morebrbrstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefitsbrbruSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu will not pay any thirdparty agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with uSalesforecomu or SalesforceorgbrbrSalesforce welcomes all
